title: [5 YoE, Self-employed, Revenue/Sales Operations, USA]
text:
Marge Vivek  
marge.vivek@gmail.com • (555) 214-7789 • linkedin.com/in/margevivek  
Austin, TX | margevivek.com

Analytical SaaS professional with 7+ years of experience leveraging technology to drive operational efficiency and  
revenue growth seeking to transition into a Revenue Operations role.

EXPERIENCE

Sunrise Supply Co. | Founder & Chief Executive Officer                                                     May 2023 - Current  
• Generated $300,000 in total gross sales by overseeing all GTM and business operations for E-Commerce business  
• Drove a 288% YoY increase in units sold by implementing AI optimized pricing strategies and inventory automation  

QuantaCloud | Senior Commercial Account Executive                                                       MARCH 2022 - June 2023  
• Influenced a 16% increase in Q3/Q4 commercial pipeline generation by owning a full redesign of outbound sales  
  cadences deployed across 30 reps  
• Attained 105% of Q4 quota by leveraging data from Salesforce CRM, ZoomInfo, Pardot, Qualified, and 6sense to create  
  custom reports that provided key territory insights and guided outreach efforts  
• Led cross-functional account team of 4, ensuring constant collaboration and alignment in over 40 projects  

BrightLedger | Senior Account Executive                                                             March 2021 - February 2022  
• Maintained a 94% customer retention rate by building and utilizing custom Salesforce reports to monitor high risk  
  accounts and up-sell opportunities  
• Exceeded FY2022 quota by 145% through partnering with C-Level Sales and Marketing Executives to understand their  
  business needs and align BrightLedger with their GTM strategy  

NimbusIQ | Mid Market Account Executive                                                               July 2020 - March 2021  
• Hit 105% of Ramp Quota by partnering cross-functionally to influence strategic account expansion and selling  
  NimbusIQ’s core product suite to a territory of 600 accounts  

SaaSly | Commercial Account Executive - Team Lead                                                         July 2019 - May 2020  
• Presidents Club Award Winner, Top Rep Across Emerging Market Segment (#1 out of 22)  
• Achieved 111% of Annual Quota by serving as a trusted advisor to executive stakeholders from opportunity creation to  
  post-sale in over 25 complex sales cycles  
• Influenced a complete overhaul of lead routing processes by providing internal leadership teams with actionable insights  
  on process bottlenecks and lead distribution data across 20+ reps  
• Promoted to Team Lead 10 months into tenure, responsible for training and mentoring 4 new reps  

AtlasData | Enterprise Sales Development - Team Lead                                                  February 2018 - June 2019  
• Presidents Club Award Winner (#1 Rep out of 40), 107% of Annual Quota, Enterprise SDR of the Year Award  
• Drove over $800,000 in ARR in 15 months by leveraging a strategic, data-driven outbound sales approach  
• Championed Salesforce territory optimization project, which resolved 2,000+ duplicate account records in Salesforce  
• Promoted to Team Lead 12 months into tenure based on organizational impact and performance  

• Certifications: Salesforce Certified Administrator (2025)  
• Skills: Process Improvement, CRM Management, Revenue Forecasting, Sales Analytics, Data Analysis, Project  
  Management, Cross-Functional Collaboration  

EDUCATION

University of Lakeside                                                                                               December 2015  
• Bachelor of Science in Sports Management, Minor in Business
